data.name: Mage of the Olekta Desert
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419750/Apostle_Rebellion/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342120/Castaway_of_the_Ardusta_Sea/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989450/Public_Defense_Corp_The_Ambassador_of_Peace/


Upcoming Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724320/Noelle_Does_Her_Best/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198850/How_to_Build_a_Magnificent_Kingdom/


About the Game



Aisha, a thief and adventurer, receives a request from the adventurers guild.

She must find the great mage, Lowen, who lives in the Olekta Desert, and deliver a letter to him.

But in order to reach him, she must first pass through the Lekta Ruins, where a dangerous group of bandits have made their base.

Features:

  • A Stealth Survival RPG Experience
  • Turn-Based Combat
  • Assassination System
  • Multiple Difficulty Levels
  • Multiple Endings!
data.about_the_game:
Aisha, a thief and adventurer, receives a request from the adventurers guild.

She must find the great mage, Lowen, who lives in the Olekta Desert, and deliver a letter to him.

But in order to reach him, she must first pass through the Lekta Ruins, where a dangerous group of bandits have made their base.

  • Assassination System

data.short_description: A stealth survival RPG. Accepting a request from the adventurers guild, Aisha must make her way through the dangerous Lekta Ruins in order to find the great mage, Lowen.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Mage of the Olekta Desert contains strong language.
